column4: if you only have the single computer directly connected to the internet it makes it harder you have to loopback all network traffic through the proxy, otherwise it can just be disabled in the browser
anyone who has physical access can circumvent. your child could get their own livecd and boot that to browse for pr0n, but if you control the only outside line...

the point is it is very minimal security, you can try to configure all the browsers to go through the proxy, but its not going to be hard to configure them to go direct *UNLESS* you make sure the only way out is through the proxy, and thats hard to do with a single system
yes thats what you want. you want your gateway to be the proxy
